description:
The Household of the Upper Floor considers Bella Rossi's return to service. Bella wants to return to the House, and her fate is decided at a petitioner's dinner. The household tests the slut's intentions through a grueling predicament bondage scene, deep cock sucking and hard pussy fucking. Bella's huge tits are used and her pretty face is covered in come before nights end. Does she pass?
House slave Odile is on hand to share in her slut sister's predicaments, and she gets her fair share of hard cock as well.
Novice trainee Kristin Kahill is left at the mercy of those assembled, and is fair game to pick on throughout the night.
title: The Petitioning of Bella Rossi
